name: Meow Nights
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2021, in which the theme was "lost and found".

Two cats get lost on a magic and cloudy dungeon while looking for some delicious sky fishes. They will have to find 5 fishes each and then find each other, so they can do the cutest sleepover ever.

There is a catch, however. The cats cannot see each other. For that reason, they have to follow the "meow" of its friend so they can stay at the same room, at the same time, with all the 10 sky fishes caught. 

Once this happens, both gotta "meow" so they can free themselves from the cloudy dungeon.

Artists: LeoDorea, Luiza Müller

Programmers: Hique, Aline Kaiper

Musician: Airton Junior
